feed.title: FreeScout Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for FreeScout: 1.8.185
entry.content:
"GPT Assistant" Chrome extension has been released by community: https://github.com/freescout-help-desk/freescout/wiki/Community-Modules

Added * Allow to prefill multiple emails via GET parameter (#4896) * Added "start new chat" option to mailbox (#4902) * Added Arabic language.

Fixed * Show error on POP3 failed authentication in mailbox Fetching settings. * Fixed group keys error in Translation manager. * In the Chat Mode automatically expand "Show Details" block if it contains invalid fields on pressing "Enter".

entry.title: New release for FreeScout: 1.8.186
entry.content:
Added * Added Romanian language.

Fixed * Fixed conversation threading for Outlook (#4922) * Do not unserialize data by default in Helper::decrypt() function. * Strip also OBJECT tag in Helper::stripDangerousTags(). * Added extra reply separator (#4764)

entry.title: New release for FreeScout: 1.8.187
entry.content: Fixed * Fixed an issue with sending attachments introduced in the previous release (#4929)

entry.title: New release for FreeScout: 1.8.188
entry.content: Fixed * Fixed an issue with sending attachments introduced in the previous release (#4929)

entry.title: New release for FreeScout: 1.8.189
entry.content: Fixed * Fix error in MailHelper::getHeader() introduced in the previous release (#4940)
